dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.modelsAvailableInPool: {{count}} models available in Antigravity shared pool

accounts.title: Account Management
accounts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
accounts.convertToSharedDesc: After converting to a shared account, this account will be added to the shared quota pool for others to use. In return, you will receive twice the quota of your submitted shared account. Are you sure you want to continue?
accounts.convertToDedicatedDesc: After converting to a dedicated account, this account will only be available for your personal use, and the available quota in your shared quota pool will be reduced accordingly. Are you sure you want to continue?
accounts.deleteAntigravityConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Antigravity account? This action cannot be undone.
accounts.deleteKiroConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Kiro account? This action cannot be undone.
accounts.clickToAddFirst: Click "Add Account" button to add your first account
accounts.clickToAddFirstKiro: Click "Add Account" button to add your first Kiro account
accounts.restrictedNotice: Your account temporarily does not have access to Antigravity.
accounts.restrictedReason: We have temporarily disabled your Antigravity account. This may be because
accounts.restrictedCountry: Your account is in a restricted country or region.
accounts.ineligible: Your account does not have Google AI eligibility.
accounts.canReenableManually: If you regain access to Antigravity, you can manually enable this account.

playground.title: Playground
playground.imageGenerationFailedNoResponse: Image generation failed, no valid response received
playground.aspectRatioTooltip: The aspect ratio of the generated image. Different aspect ratios are suitable for different use cases.
playground.imageSizeTooltip: The resolution of the generated image. Higher resolution produces clearer images, but may require longer generation time.
playground.imageSizeNotSupported: Current model does not support image size control
playground.imagenModeDescription: In this mode, you can control image generation parameters, but each generation is an independent context. You can switch to Chat mode at any time for continuous conversation. If you switch, your chat content will be cleared, please save generated images.
playground.temperatureTooltip: Controls the randomness of the output. Higher values (like 1.8) make the output more random and creative, lower values (like 0.2) make it more deterministic and focused.
playground.maxTokensTooltip: The maximum number of tokens to generate. One token is approximately 4 characters or 0.75 words. Higher values allow longer responses but also increase cost and latency.
playground.topPTooltip: Nucleus sampling parameter. Controls the range of tokens the model considers. For example, 0.1 means only considering the top 10% most probable tokens. Lower values make output more deterministic, higher values increase diversity.
playground.frequencyPenaltyTooltip: Reduces the likelihood of repeating the same content. Positive values penalize tokens based on their frequency in the text, reducing verbatim repetition.
playground.presencePenaltyTooltip: Increases the likelihood of discussing new topics. Positive values penalize tokens based on whether they've appeared in the text, encouraging the model to explore new themes and concepts.
playground.noConversationStored: We do not store your conversations. Once you refresh, this information will be lost.
playground.imageGenerating: Image generating, this may take up to several minutes to complete.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone and all applications using this key will lose access to AI resources.
settings.name: Name
settings.endpointNotice: You must provide a valid API key to access this endpoint. To get the model list, you must have valid dedicated or shared account quota. We support both OpenAI and Anthropic message formats.
settings.saveKeyNotice: Please save this key securely. You won't be able to view it again after closing this dialog.

addAccount.title: Add Account Wizard
addAccount.autoAddAfterAuth: Account will be automatically added to your account list after authorization
addAccount.authTimeoutMessage: Authorization has expired, please start over
addAccount.authExpiredMessage: Please go back and start over
addAccount.selectAccountTypePrompt: What type of account would you like to add?
addAccount.selectKiroLoginMethod: How would you like to login to Kiro?
addAccount.kiroLoginInstruction: To login to Kiro, please download and run at least once
addAccount.dedicatedAccountNote: This account will not be added to the shared account pool, and you will not receive additional shared quota from it.
addAccount.sharedNotAvailableInBeta: This option is not available in Beta.
addAccount.sharedAccountNote: Your account will be added to the shared account pool for others to use. In return, you will receive quota that is 2x the amount of quota from your submitted shared account.
addAccount.ensureAntihookRunning: Please ensure you have installed and are running
addAccount.completeAuthInNewWindow: Click the button below to complete authorization in a new window with
addAccount.autoAddAfterAuthComplete: Account will be added automatically after authorization is complete
addAccount.authTimeoutGoBack: Authorization has timed out, please go back and start over
addAccount.pasteCallbackUrlInstruction: Please paste the complete URL from your browser's address bar after completing authorization.

analytics.createApiKeyToStart: Create your API Key to start chatting!

help.title: Help
help.workingOnDocs: We are working hard to improve the help documentation, stay tuned!
help.contactAdmin: For urgent issues, please contact the administrator
help.quickStartDesc: Learn how to get started with the AntiHub platform
help.faqDesc: View frequently asked questions and solutions
help.apiDocsDesc: Detailed API usage documentation and examples

profile.betaDescription: We have launched the Beta program. After joining, you will gain access to preview features, which may not be stable, and we will not be responsible for any issues that arise.
profile.betaWarning: Once you join the Beta program, you cannot exit until new features are fully released. Beta features may be unstable. Do you want to continue?
